get.description: You can use this endpoint to get PDF contents of a letter.

parameters.description:
The ID of the notification. You can find the notification ID in the response to the original notification method call.
You can also find it by [signing in to GOV.UK Notify](https://www.notifications.service.gov.uk/sign-in) and going to the **API integration** page.
parameters.name: notification_id

200.description: If the request to the client is successful, the client will return bytes representing the raw PDF data.

400.description: Bad request. Check the `message` in the response to find out why your request failed.

403.description: Auth error. Check the `message` in the response to find out why your request failed.

404.description: Result not found. Check the `message` in the response to find out why your request failed.

get.summary: Get the the PDF contents of a letter
